pages.text: While there are many glorious entities, there is exactly one system to rule them all: the Day and the Night.$(br)This system is based on the 24 hours of the day. During each of these hours, another $(t:Also called "Hour")deity$() reigns. As the hour is determined by the state of the sun at that moment, each deity can reign over the entire planet, but only in a restricted area for a certain amount of time.
This also means that the deities can only be accessed by mortals during this time / in this place, unless special arrangements took place.
